com.appboy.ui

Class AppboyContentCardsFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.appboy.ui.AppboyContentCardsFragment

  • public class AppboyContentCardsFragment
extends Fragment
    A fragment to display ContentCards.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      A main thread runnable to handle ContentCardsUpdatedEvent on the main thread.
      protected class  AppboyContentCardsFragment.NetworkUnavailableRunnable
      A main thread runnable to handle displaying network unavailable messages on the main thread.

      • getContentCardUpdateHandler

        public IContentCardsUpdateHandler getContentCardUpdateHandler()
        Returns:
        The custom card update handler if not null. Else returns the default handler.

      • setContentCardUpdateHandler

        public void setContentCardUpdateHandler(IContentCardsUpdateHandler contentCardUpdateHandler)
        Sets an IContentCardsUpdateHandler for this AppboyContentCardsFragment.
        Parameters:
        contentCardUpdateHandler - a handler for doing any work on Cards before being rendered in the ContentCards.

      • getContentCardsViewBindingHandler

        public IContentCardsViewBindingHandler getContentCardsViewBindingHandler()
        Returns:
        The custom view binding handler if not null. Else returns the default handler.

      • setContentCardsViewBindingHandler

        public void setContentCardsViewBindingHandler(IContentCardsViewBindingHandler contentCardsViewBindingHandler)
        Sets the IContentCardsViewBindingHandler. Note that this method should only be called before the AppboyContentCardsFragment is first displayed or the AppboyCardAdapter will not update correctly.
        Parameters:
        contentCardsViewBindingHandler - The IContentCardsViewBindingHandler responsible for rendering each Card in the RecyclerView.

      • onSaveInstanceState

        public void onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle outState)

      • onViewStateRestored

        public void onViewStateRestored(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • getContentCardsRecyclerView

        public RecyclerView getContentCardsRecyclerView()
        The RecyclerView used in this fragment. Note that this will be null until Fragment#onCreateView(LayoutInflater, ViewGroup, Bundle) is called.
        Returns:
        A android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView associated with AppboyContentCardsFragment.

      • initializeRecyclerView

        protected void initializeRecyclerView()

      • attachSwipeHelperCallback

        protected void attachSwipeHelperCallback()
        Creates and attaches a SimpleItemTouchHelperCallback to handle swipe-to-dismiss functionality.

      • swapRecyclerViewAdapter

        protected void swapRecyclerViewAdapter(RecyclerView.Adapter newAdapter)
        Swaps the current RecyclerView android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter for a new one. If the current adapter matches the new adapter, then this method does nothing.
